data.name: Dictator: Glory Fatherland
data.detailed_description:
Dictator: Glory Fatherland

Become a leader of Republic of Sveklovia which is tearing apart by the civil war between nine regions of the country. Unite your country around the capital city without losing the trust of its citizens.

POLITICS

According to the old tradition, every day the country leader receives citizens with complaints and suggestions in his office. He must ensure that all eight political factions are working in harmony, otherwise if you give someone too much power or oppress someone too much, you will not remain a leader for too long.

BUILDING CONSTRUCTION

Factories, theaters, power plants and radio towers. In order to unite and restore Sveklovia, every citizen must contribute in making better future for his country.

WAR

Produce weapons for your army to fight rebels and free your people from their oppression. You can also try to make a deal with one of the factions and if you succeed they provide you with their unique unit to help with war against rebels.

CONSEQUENCES

Every political decision you make will has a consequence. If you decide to appoint a poacher to the post of Minister of Ecology and he issues a law on shooting Red Book animals, the fault is yours.

data.short_description: Assume the role of the ruler of the Republic of Beetrootopia, which is in a state of civil war between 9 cities that want to become the capital. You have to not only arm your army and seize the territories of the separatists, but also solve the problems of your citizens who come to bow to you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 5450 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
